review_content: Awesome experience. We had to use their customer support to fix our invoice data and they provided outstanding timing and support!

review_title: The product arrived on time all the‚Ä¶
review_content: The product arrived on time all the assembly details were perfect made it very handy and clear great service well done

review_title: i ordered a beauty therapy trolley
review_content: i ordered a beauty therapy trolleyi ordered a beauty therapy trolley, item arrived in perished packaging, item was clearly used and returned, had rusty feet, broken castors, missing plastic trim, whole item was dirty and scratched, customer service said i had to source my own replacement packaging as original had perished. customer service offered me 20% discount or i could return the dirty, broken trolley, customer service sent me an evri label, had to try 4 shops before my parcel was accepted, drop off shops said parcel was too big for the type of return label issued ???still in the process of getting replacement item/refund. disgusting customer service experience, will not buy from then again, dr hasan emzi skin clinic manchester. undoubtedly there will be an expondo customer service response to this review claiming it is false and i have "got things wrong" do not trust them, order from expondo at your peril!update 9/1/24 - beacuse expondo used the cheapest return method possible, the return is still in transit ????? useless. i posted it on 23/12/23update 13/1/24expondo have still not received the return ???[from tracking page]It's bookedWe've got it15:47 - Sat Dec 23We've received your parcel at the ParcelShop and we'll be collecting it shortly13:26 - Wed Dec 27We've tried to collect this parcel but it's too large for this courier. Please contact the retailer to book with our Specialist Evri couriers13:36 - Fri Dec 29maybe they should sort out the returns methodexpondo refusing to refund or replaceas far as i am concerned this is thefti will report to trading standards and credit card company.disgusting company - avoid.Date of experience: 23 December 2023

review_title: Fast service and good price-quality ratio.
review_content: I had some specific questions about a product, which were promptly and adequately addressed. Additionally, the price-quality ratio is very favorable!
Super fast shopping, I found my product quickly, no problems. all information I needed about technical parameters was available, so no need to get in touch with virtual assistant. I like this store.

Recieved a poultry scalder from expondo, we recieved the item, when we came to use the tap would not shut off so water was just coming out so couldnt use, got in touch with them, said they would send a replacement tap, we are still waiting 6 week later, keep getting in touch just excuse after excuse, first it would be sent after Christmas then after the new year, then it was out of stock, then there was a inventory problem, then is was ready to be shipped a week ago, still nothing, then it was ready to be shipped and they would do it asap still nothing, got in touch again, they said they were going to send a red note to there warehouse to get it shipped, I am still waiting for a email saying it's been shipped, after purchase is a nightmare, just wont do what they say they are going to do, just keep fobbing you off, this is a new product and still under warranty, but wont send a replacement part when they say they would

review_title: ordered and recieved a honey extractor
review_content: ordered and recieved a honey extractor, the central basket/drum had not been properly made and it is impossible to use, we then found that Expondo has no contact details online and no email, so it is impossible to contact them, or send images.It is the 3rd item we have bought, we will not buy another, it will be interesting to raise a small claims action.DONT buy from companies without contact details!

review_title: I bought a product from Expondo
review_content: I bought a product from Expondo, but it was not as described. I made a complain and they came with a solution that I am satisfied with. Thank you Expondo. Thumbs up ‚ò∫Ô∏è
all good, very good service, did multiply orders.

review_title: I bought a water distiller to be fair‚Ä¶
review_content: I bought a water distiller to be fair item arrived on time no broken my problem was the instructions manual it was useless I had no clear pics or instructions on how to set up. Also the pump they provided did not come with Uk plug. They were quick to respond to my email but just sent a copy of the manuel that come with it so no good. I‚Äôm now in the process of returnin Item but not been easy they said to drop it at an automated post box thing. Qr code was not expected. I then rang helpline that machine provided I was told that the item is not supposed to be returned via machine. The courier they use is Hermes and apparently I can take the QR code provided into shop to be picked up. I just hope they will pay full refund without getting bank involved.
Terrible service, little professionalism, practically zero customer service. Terrible service, a huge joke!!

review_title: The support service was first class excellent company
review_content: The support service was first class. Exce
Product as described
Great service, they are very kind and they answer very quick.
Fast, accurate, good product
Value for money.  Free delivery
Very good excellent quick delivery üööüòÅ thank you
All good ... Thanks
Quality cooking supplies can be purchased here. However. The shipment speed should be improved.

review_title: Released by customs not got any further
review_content: Edit: Product finally came after contacting the through Facebook. Happy with what we finally received, but probably won‚Äôt use these again due to shipping problems.The product I ordered was released by customs since 8/11/2023 but hasn‚Äôt got any further, can‚Äôt find anywhere to contact company to chase it up
Thank you, I received the welding machine.I recommend the company.

review_title: I ordered an item but the shipping‚Ä¶
review_content: I ordered an item but the shipping company was awful.However, I emailed expondo.com, and the problem was resolved overnight. Will order again from Expondo

review_title: Good product and very good service

review_content: Product on web-site looks exactly the same as is delivered. Very good quality- price ratio. Quick delivery, easy to assemble

Purchase proces 'mothers milk' pleasant and easy at the same time.I bought the greenhouse.Product in general is OK.We set it on the concrete foundation so it stand very solid. Great thinks are the gutters on both side so water is kept away.One concern are quite fast rusting screws and not fully closed roof windowall in all product looks promising :)Service of Expondo is fast and reliable, after rising concern about some spare parts we get it with no problem

I haven't had time to deal with the power supply yet due to other work. I did some tests and the voltage on this power supply seems pretty accurate, the current limit does its job. Parallel and serial mode work fine. This equipment has USB, serial and RJ45 connectors. The included CD contains drivers and programming software.The price of the device was very friendly. Shipping was very fast.So I like this device. I am satisfied with the purchase.

Ordered some stainless steelposts and straps for a new art gallery. Top notch quality product , superbly packed, swiftly delivered. I thought great value for the product quality. Could do with a little more communication - delivery turned up and it was only by chance that I was there. But bar that tiny criticism (easy to address) very good company to deal with.

Perfectly delivered. This machine was much better than I expected, of course I expected it to be perfect! So silent and you can slice it so thin that you can se through it! Even the hardest salami was sliced like a warm knife in butter. I really recommend this and the only thing I regret is that I didn't buy it sooner.

The equipment was fairly priced compared to similar. The advert said 3 day‚Äôs delivery but it took 7 so planning the job was affected, however the saving & the equipment made me happy with the deal. 33% less than competitors. Excellent value.

Thanks to resourceful customer service, my RCMB-2LA blender is working properly again.Elena from expondo GmbH has become my favorite person from the company. She solved my problem quickly and efficiently. It turns out that keeping a customer after warranty is as important as getting a new one. We are staying for a long time with products from exppondo.

review_title: Great quality product and in great‚Ä¶
review_content: Great quality product and in great condition. No issue with expondo although bear in mind 1-3 days delivery may apply to some items but mine came from Poland and I don't recall seeing it could take around 2 weeks which I see as acceptable but I was expecting far sooner so just bare that in mind. May also have been due to stuff like a certain country trying to take over a bordering country which may also cause delays. #furussia

I borrowed a brand new popcorn machine for a party. It was really nice looking and had two small doors made of glass.  Unfortunately one of the doors was shattered during the party. I contacted expondo customer service to buy a new door since the machine was originally supplied by them.Chrissie from expondo was an excellent help in a somewhat difficult situation. The door was not on stock right away but Chrissie contacted me as soon as it was available and I got a new door shipped to my home at a very reasonable price. Excellent service.

Quick checkout. Bought air purifier 10050053 works proper - used to desinfect the interior of some cars because the cabin air filter change didn't help much. After the deodorisation (~30 min.) the unpleasant smell shortly after after turning on the AC is finally gone! Only drawback is the full user manual non included in the package but downloadable form the shop manual QR-code or link...but I'm an old school guy who prefers the printed ones.A product worth recommendation after all!

I‚Äôm very disappointed over this company, and the wrong doing of them!1. April 2022 at 12:45 didI received a email about a refund, and there was a code, that I should‚Äôve be able access but yet it didn‚Äôt work.I have tried contacting them over every possible way, no response and not!!If I was you do not buy from expondo!I have lost 577,34 pounds because they can‚Äôt afford to give it back to me.I‚Äôm disappointed and very furious over this situation!!!!!!!

In many situations of everyday life you need tools that are only used occasionally and that are not exposed to extreme continuous stress. in these cases, expensive branded products are a pointless waste of money. expondo. com precisely fulfills its purpose  in this area: good quality, low prices. the processing from order to delivery runs perfectly.
